Create a keychain with a built-in flashlight for nighttime use.
Integrate a fingerprint scanner into the car keys to unlock the door and start the car.
Develop a smartphone app that can remotely lock and unlock the car, as well as track the location of the keys.
Create a magnetic key holder that can attach to the underside of the car, making it easier to retrieve the keys.
Add a USB port to the car keys to charge mobile devices on the go.
